title: Favourite new mid champs?
body:
I'm gonna be honest, I don't like some of the new styles of some of the new champs. More specifically, Vlad and Malz, I know they were meant to really strong, but, I just don't find their playstyles/new playstyles enjoyable. Malz with the new voidling focus is just not something that feels enjoyable, and Vlad's massive low mobility-backline focus-do zero damage tanks is not something I enjoy. Veigar feels absurdly strong but again, doesn't inhabit a playstyle I'm used to.

Personally, I'm in LOVE with the new Cassiopeia. So much mobility and even though not buying boots feels wierd, you definitely feel the power of skipping boots for more damage items.

replies.body: Although she didn't recieve any direct changed the new gunblade is super strong on katarina.. you can literally 1 shot enemies faster than a renger with hextech qwe cause hextech scales with ap and has a base of like 250 dmg, I also like velkoz's changes, they make him so strong!
that base was 400 on the pbe. be happy still not broken
Strong enough to make it a priority first item build?

Well I am currently messing around with it and in most cases getting it first item gives the katarina player an insurmountable lead which allows her to snowball the whole game. Although depending on the matchup it is not all ways a first item pickup but currently I purchase it in nearly all games.

PS: First time playing league in over 2 weeks and using this items power I moved up a teir in under a day.
